posts.title: Start a Blog with Hexo
posts.text: 这是用于建立本博客的代码 All the codes below run in git bash npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org #使用淘宝镜像下载 cnpm hexo -v mikdr C:/AT/Course/Bioinfo-LZ/Page #建立一个空文件夹，务必为空 hexo init #在本文件夹建立hexo ls hexo s hexo server -p 4010 #如果默认的4000网站打不开，可以在此处重新设置 hexo n "my post" #新建文章 cd source/_posts/ ls vim my-post.md #使用md语法写博文即可 cd ../.. hexo clean hexo g #生成 hexo server -p 4010 cnpm install --save hexo-deployer-git #以下为链接到gitpage的方法 vim _config.yml #设置deploy: type: 'git' repo: 'GitHub库地址' branch: 'main' hexo d #推送到远端 git clone https://github.com/litten/hexo-theme-yilia.git themes/yilia #以下为更换主题的方法 cd themes cd C:/AT/Course/Bioinfo-LZ/Page vim _config.yml #更改theme hexo clean #以下四步每次更新设置或推送时均需重复 hexo g hexo server -p 4010 hexo d This Blog references video from Bilibili: 手把手教你从0开始搭建自己的个人博客 |无坑版视频教程| hexo

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
